title: Santosh (2024)
text:
"Santosh, there are two types of untouchables in this country, those whom no one wants to touch and those whom no one can."

Sandhya Suriâ€™s lens delves into the patriarchy, casteism, Islamphobia, sexism and police brutality with such deft clarity that all the layers of the onion unfold to reveal the rotten core. With amazing performances from both the actresses
